values.value: Creates a new record in Salesforce

âž• CreateRecord Action

This action creates a new record in Salesforce for the selected object.

Backend Configuration

  • objectApiName (String): The Salesforce object to create (required, auto-populated from object selection)
  • defaultFieldValues (Object): Default values to set on the new record (optional)

Parameters (AI will provide)

Parameters are dynamically generated based on the selected object's fields. The AI will provide field values when creating the record.

  • Select an object above to see available fields
  • Add parameters for fields the AI should be able to set
  • Required fields should be marked as required
